definitions.definition: A vertical cylindrical machine that revolves on a spindle , typically surmounted by a drumhead with sockets for levers for turning it; used to apply force to cables , ropes , etc.
A rotating spindle used to move recording tape through the mechanism of a tape recorder .

main_definition: ( especially nautical ) A vertical cylindrical machine that revolves on a spindle , typically surmounted by a drumhead with sockets for levers for turning it; used to apply force to cables , ropes , etc.
secondary_definitions: ( electronics ) A rotating spindle used to move recording tape through the mechanism of a tape recorder .
